message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm happy to pay $105.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $115.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $115 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go to $110.  This is my final offer.
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $112. I'm willing to make one more compromise to get this deal done.
